string-array.name: create_table
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS home_city (_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, CITY_ID VARCHR(20) NOT NULL , NAME VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL , HOT INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS login_infor (_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USERID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, MOBILE VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, VERIFY_STATUS INTEGER, SHOPNAME VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS buscard_manager (_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, POSITION VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, COMPANY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, MOBILE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,LANDLINE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,WEIXING VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, ADDRESS VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,REMARK VARCHAR(100), TIME VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL ,ID VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,VERIFY_STATUS VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL);
